rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Lately, the adventurers and merchants
who visit this port have a constant edge
of worry in their voices.

rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0002
rows.name:
The great Divine Beast of Acedia has sunk
beneath the clouds, and three others
have gathered around the World Tree...

rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0003
rows.name: Nothing about any of this is normal.

rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Gula is still quite far from the Tree,
but I'm sure we will be plagued with
people fleeing from the danger zone.

rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0005
rows.name: How did the world come to this...?

rows.label: tlk41300021_04_msg0006
rows.name:
It feels like the notion of peace has
faded away into a distant dream.
